subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Eric Hinske slammed his chin into the ground making a spectacular, run-saving catch, then hit a go-ahead homer two innings later to give the Boston Red Sox a 4-2 victory and a doubleheader sweep of the visiting Detroit Tigers yesterday.
snippet: Eric Hinske slammed his chin into the ground making a spectacular, run-saving catch, then hit a go-ahead homer two innings later to give the Boston Red Sox a 4-2 victory and a doubleheader sweep of the visiting Detroit Tigers yesterday.
